alert.note: Alert for South Central Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:18PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kane County through 345 PM MDT... At 318 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Kanab, moving northwest at 15 mph. Additional thunderstorms are in a line from northwest of Kanab to the Utah/Arizona border. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kanab, Orderville, Glendale and Mt Carmel. This includes US Route 89 between mile markers 48 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
